effect.name: Full Color (Float)
effect.description: Sets the color of the entire sprite to only one RGB value. Values range from 0.0 to 1.0
effect.author: YohananDiamond, EX64
effect.copyright: Free for commercial and not commercial, no attribution needed

parameter.name: R Value
parameter.description: The amount of (R)ed on the color - from 0.0 to 1.0.

parameter.name: G Value
parameter.description: The amount of (G)reen on the color - from 0.0 to 1.0.

parameter.name: B Value
parameter.description: The amount of (B)lue on the color - from 0.0 to 1.0.
